attributes.action: To hold a general election as the public has lost confidence in borris Johnston
attributes.additional_details: After the current report was released, it is important the public view are considered. The only way to determine how the public feel would be though a general election.
attributes.background: As a member of the public I have lost confidence in Borris Johnston. More people are losing confidence in the government as a whole. I would like the government to hold a general election and allow the public views to be heard.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
